allow: Bash(for file in scholarship.html testimonials.html contact-apply.html)

Bash(do sed -i 's|<link rel=""icon"" type=""image/png"" href=""/src/assets/images/logo.png"">|<link rel=""icon"" type=""image/png"" href=""/src/assets/images/logo.png"">\n    <link rel=""stylesheet"" href=""https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.4.0/css/all.min.css"">|g' "$file")
Bash(for file in about-services.html scholarship.html testimonials.html contact-apply.html)
Bash(do sed -i 's|||g' "$file")
